name: Death Frontier Sniper
description:
Shoot and kill! Aim faster with your assault rifles and sniper to secure the destructive city from the walking brutal zombie. Stay high alert with the actions of the brutal zombie war assault shooting. Select your target and unleash the massacre! Become the ultimate combat zombie sniper shooter of the zombie killing mission.

Show your skills of the undead zombie war sniper shooter in this FPS shooting game with HD graphics and deadly weapons. Become the dead shooter in this war survival missions. Enter into the city in which you are required to kill zombie assault now in the destructive city. Complete the missions now and get the bonuses. Aim and shoot with different weapon arsenal to sweep the entire city from deadly zombie. Survive because you are the only one left to become the brutal zombie deadly survival hunter.

Game Features:
- Classic 3D action control
- Realistic 3D graphics
- Dynamic effects
- Very scary and dangerous deads
- Crowd of the evil running zombies
- Open space 3D enviroment zombie land
- Shooting off zombie heads, arms and legs
- Free download
